Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: TANK ON THE MOON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Revealing near-lost stories about Soviet-made robots that patrolled the Lunar surface in the 1970s.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: History, Art and Culture are all concentrating in the Eternal city, the open air museums tells of its ancient and extraordinary past. Rome uncovers its beauty all over, from the small alleys to the magnificent squares and is sorrounded by magic landscapes with its beautiful villas and castles

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Veterinary surgeon must fix cross border collie Sasha's blown disk with a specially designed bolt to insert into her spine, and he must save a cat maimed by a car.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the edge of Western Australia's dry and desolate desert lies a marine reserve known as Ningaloo Reef. Ningaloo is one of the world's largest fringing reefs, and it stretches north to south for over 180 miles. And even though It's only 2% the size of the Great Barrier Reef, it rivals it in diversity.

Clip.Title: LIONS IN BATTLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: After a harsh season, the lionesses of The Okavango Delta in southern Africa struggle to feed their cubs, often entering enemy territory to find food to save their pride.

Clip.Title: DUGONG AND DIN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A boy forges an incredible relationship with one of the world's rarest and little known mammals- the Dugong, or sea cow.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Little parts of our world disappear every day. Join host, Tom Cavanagh as learns what Smithsonian experts are doing to protect the best aspects of our world for future generations using "extreme conservation."

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: join host Tom Cavanagh (from TV's "Ed") as we explore the crime "scene" at the Smithsonian's Vaults: photographic evidence from the Crime of the Century; everyone's favorite natural villain, the snake; and America's first "Lone Gunman": John Wilkes Booth.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1975, The Sentry, a state-of-the-art Russian warship, was taken over by a rogue Soviet officer. This remarkable mutiny not only inspired the best-selling political thriller and the Sean Connery/Alec Baldwin blockbuster, "The Hunt for Red October," it almost triggered World War III.

Clip.Title: PHIL COLLINS: GOING BACK TO DETROIT
Clip.Episode: Phil Collins: Going Back to Detroit
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Phil Collins back to the birthplace of Motown, as he joins the Funk Brothers for one soul-filled night of legendary music.
